meanings.definition: A mass of undifferentiated cells capable of growth and differentiation into specialized tissues.
meanings.sent1: The blastemas in the embryo develop into different body parts.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study blastemas to understand how cells can transform into specific tissues.
meanings.sent3: The blastemas in the lab were like tiny magical building blocks.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a blastemas, shaping ideas into beautiful creations.
meanings.sent5: The potential of blastemas to become anything is truly fascinating.

meanings.definition: A structure in an organism capable of regeneration.
meanings.sent1: The lizard's tail blastemas regrew after being detached.
meanings.sent2: Certain animals have blastemas that allow them to heal wounds quickly.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's blastemas could regenerate any damaged part in seconds.
meanings.sent4: Hope was her blastemas, always renewing her spirit after challenges.
meanings.sent5: The blastemas of a starfish can regrow an entire limb, like a superpower.
